message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great asset to you as well. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects the quality, functionality, and the unique features that make this product stand out. I trust you will find it to be a worthwhile investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase.
